root: ^We're here. This damned graveyard for elites. An' we ain't like 'em, what chance do we have to make any difference?
^If it's the only way for us to be taken seriously, a task even the organization hasn't been able to do, maybe it's worth a try anyway.
^We can either keep getting treated like dirt, or die making a path for ourselves.
^Have y'all ever even thought of why the organization hasn't cleared out this dungeon yet?
^W-well now that you mention it, I don't think we bumped into any monsters on our way here.
^T-the scent I've been detecting has all been concentrated in there, maybe Sunder has a point…
^At least someone's got some sense. Don't start throwin' a hissy fit when Flux's sister doesn't have anyone to take care of her. An' don't come cryin' to me when we lose one of y'all.
^HEY! Sunder, I understand your fear but are you content living like this forever? Maybe it would be for the best to die trying to bring about a better world.
^Tsk, there's no point in fussin' about it. If this is what y'all want then we have no choice, just promise me that y'all will look out for each other.
